data.name: AskAnExpertPlaceholderText
data.value: Введите здесь подробности своего вопроса (не более 500 символов)
data.comment: Ask an expert placeholder text.

data.name: AskAnExpertTitleText
data.comment: Title of the ask an expert card.

data.name: AskAnExpertText2
data.value: ... Если мой ответ вас не устроил, я свяжу вас со специалистом.
data.comment: Helps the user in understanding there is an expert team to connect to.

data.name: FeedbackText1
data.value: Расскажите моей команде экспертов, как я справляюсь, чтобы они помогли мне стать лучше.
data.comment: Text suggests that user is invited to share his feedback on his experience using bot.

data.name: FunctionCardText1
data.comment: Explains what bot does and possible questions.

data.name: FunctionCardText2
data.value: Вы можете задавать вопросы, а я постараюсь на них ответить. Если нужны дополнительные действия, я могу их выполнить...
data.comment: Suggests the user to ask question.

data.name: ShareFeedbackButtonText
data.comment: Button text for share feedback show card in QnA response card.

data.name: DescriptionText
data.comment: Label text for description.

data.name: FeedbackDescriptionPlaceholderText
data.value: Оставьте здесь свой отзыв и дополнительную информацию (не более 500 символов)
data.comment: Placeholder label where the user enters feedback in the text box.

data.name: StatusFactTitle
data.comment: Status one of the available fact set in notification cards.

data.name: AskAnExpertButtonText
data.comment: Action button which invokes ask an expert show card.

data.name: ThankYouTextContent
data.value: Спасибо за отзыв! Я отправил его экспертам. Это помогает мне учиться и совершенствоваться.
data.comment: The content for the thank you adaptive card which is shown whenever user submits feedback on the app or on a response that is generated by QnA service.

data.name: ChatTextButton
data.comment: Ability to chat directly with end user from SME channel.

data.name: NotificationCardContent
data.value: Я поделился вашим вопросом с группой. Специалист скоро свяжется с вами в отдельном чате.
data.comment: Confirmation message to the user upon asking question to the expert.

data.name: TeamChatHeaderText
data.comment: Team carousel chat card header-title of the chat card.

data.name: TeamChatContent
data.value: Чтобы начать прямую беседу, нажмите кнопку "чат с пользователем".
data.comment: Team carousel chat card content- SME team members can chat directly with the end users.

data.name: TeamNotificationHeaderText
data.comment: Team carousel function card content- title of the chat card.

data.name: TeamNotificationContent
data.value: Вы можете просмотреть пользователей, которым нужна помощь.
data.comment: Team carousel function card content- team can take the question from the end users through bot.

data.name: TeamTicketSystemHeaderText
data.comment: Title of the query carousel card- ticket system.

data.name: TeamTicketSystemContent
data.value: Чтобы отслеживать запросы, пометьте их как назначенные или закрытые.
data.comment: Team carousel query card content- team can keep track of the user request.

data.name: TakeATeamTourButtonText
data.comment: Action button which gives tour for the team on bot Functionalities.

data.name: WelcomeTeamCardContent
data.value:
Здравствуйте!
Я ваш дружелюбный бот для вопросов и ответов. Я помогаю вам предоставлять поддержку пользователям, которые взаимодействуют со мной и нуждаются в дополнительной помощи.
data.comment: Welcome message when bot is added to a new team.

data.name: CustomMessage
data.value: У меня нет ответа на этот вопрос. Хотите, я запрошу специалиста?
data.comment: Message when user asks random question to the bot.

data.name: QuestionAskedFactTitle
data.comment: The fact set title for the question asked in the SME Ticket card.

data.name: QuestionForExpertSubHeaderText
data.comment: Text says that user is asking a question to the expert, {0} placeholder holds the name of the person.

data.name: TeamCustomMessage
data.value: Я не могу отвечать на команды в каналах. Просмотрите краткий обзор, чтобы узнать, что я умею делать.
data.comment: When SME team member asks bot a questions- a message appears saying that team member is supposed to install the bot in personal scope.

data.name: ChangeStatusButtonText
data.comment: Text on change status button.

data.name: ResponseHeaderText
data.comment: Response header-letting the user know that a response is generated to their request from Question Answering.

data.name: ClosedFactTitle
data.comment: Closed fact title is one of the available fact set.

data.name: DateCreatedDisplayFactTitle
data.comment: Created: one of the available fact set in notification cards- created is the title for created date value.

data.name: ShowCardTitleText
data.comment: Label text where users enters title for his question or feedback.

data.name: MandatoryTitleFieldText
data.comment: Text that suggest users to fill mandatory fields.

data.name: ResultsFeedbackText
data.comment: This text is used as title for results feedback card.

data.name: FeedbackAlertText
data.comment: Text in the SME feedback card, The placeholder {0} represents the name of the person sharing the feedback. The placeholder {1} represents the feedback type.

data.name: ShareFeedbackTitleText
data.comment: Title text of share feedback user carousel card.

data.name: SubmitButtonText
data.comment: Button to submit user activity.

data.name: AskAnExpertDisplayText
data.comment: Ask an expert display text: text sent to the bot when ask an expert button is clicked.

data.name: ShareFeedbackDisplayText
data.comment: Share feedback display text: text sent to the bot when share feedback button is clicked.

data.name: SMEAssignedStatus
data.comment: Message posted to the thread when the ticket is assigned. {0} = name of SME who assigned the request.

data.name: SMEClosedStatus
data.comment: Message posted to the thread when the ticket is closed. {0} = name of SME who closed the request.

data.name: SMEOpenedStatus
data.value: Этот запрос теперь не назначен. Автор последнего обновления {0}.
data.comment: Message posted to the thread when the ticket is reopened. {0} = name of SME who reopened the request.

data.name: AssignedTicketUserNotification
data.value: Ваш вопрос передан специалисту. Он свяжется с вами напрямую в чате.
data.comment: Notification text sent to the user who opened a ticket, when the ticket is assigned to an expert.

data.name: ClosedTicketUserNotification
data.value: Этот запрос закрыт. Попросите специалиста еще раз, если вам по-прежнему требуется помощь.
data.comment: Notification text sent to the user who opened a ticket, when the ticket is closed.

data.name: ReopenedTicketUserNotification
data.value: Ваш запрос открыт повторно. Специалист свяжется с вами напрямую в чате.
data.comment: Notification text sent to the user who opened a ticket, when the ticket is reopened.

data.name: GoToOriginalThreadButtonText
data.comment: Go to original thread button available on messaging extension card.

data.name: NonSMEErrorText
data.value: Расширение обмена сообщениями можно вызвать только из канала, в котором установлено приложение.
data.comment: Error message when a user of non-SME team tries to access messaging extension application

data.name: AssignedUserNotificationStatus
data.comment: The status value for the user notification when a ticket is assigned to an expert

data.name: ClosedUserNotificationStatus
data.comment: The status value for the user notification when a ticket is closed by an expert.

data.name: UnassignedUserNotificationStatus
data.comment: The status value for the user notification when a ticket is unassigned

data.name: SMEUserChatMessage
data.comment: The {0} is the placeholder for the title that the user had provided when asking an expert.

data.name: AssignToMeActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: The dropdown choice for "Assign to me" for the SME ticket status is being updated

data.name: CloseActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: The dropdown choice for "Close" for when the SME ticket status is being updated

data.name: ReopenActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: The dropdown choice for "Reopen" for when the SME ticket status is being updated from the closed status.

data.name: ReopenAssignToMeActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: The dropdown choice for "Reopen and assign to me" for when the SME ticket status is being updated from the closed state.

data.name: UnassignActionChoiceTitle
data.comment: The dropdown choice for "Unassign" for when the SME ticket status is being updated

data.name: SMETicketAssignedStatus
data.comment: This value represents the SME Ticket in the Assigned status - {0} represents the SME User to whom a ticket has been assigned

data.name: SMETicketClosedStatus
data.comment: This value represents the SME Ticket in the Closed status

data.name: SMETicketUnassignedStatus
data.comment: This value represents the SME Ticket in the Unassigned status

data.name: AskAnExpertSubheaderText
data.value: Скоро с вами свяжется один из наших специалистов.
data.comment: Ask en expert card subtitle text:lets the user know that SME team member can directly chat with the requester.

data.name: DescriptionFact
data.comment: Available factset in user notification and SME facing cards.

data.name: FeedbackRatingRequired
data.comment: Feedback(Required): label for the feedback rating dropdown.

data.name: HelpfulRatingText
data.comment: Helpful: available feedback rating scale.

data.name: NeedsImprovementRatingText
data.comment: Needs improvement: available feedback rating scale.

data.name: RatingTitle
data.comment: Rating fact is used in SME facing feedback card to show the rating submitted by the user from the rating dropdown in share feedback card.

data.name: RatingMandatoryText
data.comment: Rating is mandatory , a warning message to the user when rating is not submitted in share feedback activity.

data.name: TakeATourButtonText
data.comment: Take a tour button available for the users on welcome card, through which user can take a tour on bot functionalities in personal scope.

data.name: TitleFact
data.comment: Title fact is used to show the title entered by the user for his inquiry.

data.name: TitleRequiredText
data.comment: Title(Required): label of the title text box.

data.name: NotHelpfulRatingText
data.comment: Unhelpful: available feedback rating scale.

data.name: ViewArticleButtonText
data.comment: The necessary string for the view article button

data.name: SMEFeedbackHeaderText
data.comment: Title text for SME facing feedback card.

data.name: EmptyQuestionErrorText
data.value: Текст вопроса не может быть пустым.
data.comment: Error message to show if question text box is empty while adding or editing the QnA pair.

data.name: AnswerTitle
data.comment: Label text for answer on the card.

data.name: DeleteConfirmation
data.value: Вы действительно хотите удалить этот элемент? Вопрос и ответ будут удалены.
data.comment: Delete confirmation message.

data.name: DeleteButtonText
data.comment: Delete button text.

data.name: LastEditedText
data.comment: Show message on adaptive card after editing the QnA pair.

data.name: No
data.comment: No button text on delete QnA pair confirmation card.

data.name: QuestionTitle
data.comment: Label text for question on the card.

data.name: EditButtonText
data.comment: Edit button text.

data.name: WaitMessageAnswer
data.value: Примечание. Обновления вносятся каждые несколько минут
data.comment: Wait message to show on adaptive card after performing any action on QnA pair.

data.name: Yes
data.comment: Yes button text on delete QnA pair confirmation card.

data.name: DeletedQnaPair
data.comment: Text shown on the card when a QnA pair is deleted.

data.name: UpdateHistoryButtonText
data.comment: Update history button text.

data.name: WaitMessage
data.value: Подождите некоторое время, обновления для этого вопроса: "{0}" будут доступны в течение короткого времени.
data.comment: Wait message to show below the adaptive card while trying to delete the question and is not available in production knowledgebase and waiting to be publish.

data.name: AddQuestionSubtitle
data.comment: The subtitle at the top of task module while adding the new QnA pair.

data.name: EditQuestionSubtitle
data.comment: The subtitle at the top of task module while editing the QnA pair.

data.name: HTMLErrorText
data.comment: Error message to show if HTML tags are entered on any field while adding or editing the QnA pair.

data.name: QuestionAlreadyExistsErrorText
data.value: Вопрос уже существует. Добавьте другой вопрос.
data.comment: Error message to show if question is already existing in the knowledgebase while adding or editing the QnA pair.

data.name: OpenArticle
data.comment: Open article button text, which will show on adaptiver rich card if redirection url field is filled while adding/editing the QnA pair.

data.name: BackButtonCommandText
data.comment: Back button command text to identify the performed action.

data.name: InvalidImageUrlErrorText
data.comment: Error message to show if image url is not valid while adding or editing the QnA pair.

data.name: EmptyImageUrlErrorText
data.value: URL-адрес изображения не может быть пустым.
data.comment: Error message to show if image url text box is empty while adding or editing the QnA pair.

data.name: EntryCreatedByText
data.comment: Show message on adaptive card, after adding the QnA pair.

data.name: DescriptionPlaceholderText
data.comment: Placeholder text for description text box.

data.name: ImageUrlPlaceholderText
data.comment: Placeholder text for image url text box.

data.name: QuestionPlaceholderText
data.comment: Placeholder text for question text box.

data.name: RedirectionUrlPlaceholderText
data.comment: Placeholder text for redirection url text box.

data.name: SubtitlePlaceholderText
data.comment: Placeholder text for subtitle text box.

data.name: TitlePlaceholderText
data.comment: Placeholder text for title text box.

data.name: BackButtonText
data.comment: The back button text on the add/edit QnA pair task module, while previewing the card.

data.name: InvalidRedirectUrlText
data.comment: Error message to show if redirection url is not valid while adding or editing the QnA pair.

data.name: DescriptionLabelText
data.comment: Label text for description text box.

data.name: QuestionLabelText
data.comment: Label text for question text box.

data.name: TitleLabelText
data.comment: Label text for title text box.

data.name: ImageLabelText
data.comment: Label text for image url text box.

data.name: RedirectionLabelText
data.comment: Label text for redirection url text box.

data.name: SubtitleLabelText
data.comment: Label text for subtitle text box.

data.name: UpdateHistoryHeadersText
data.comment: Header text for update history adaptiver card. which shows the history of actions performed by users on a QnA pair.

data.name: EmptyTitleErrorText
data.comment: Error message to show if title text box is empty while adding or editing the QnA pair.

data.name: GoToThread
data.comment: Button title for the card created through Messaging Extension

data.name: PreviewButtonText
data.comment: Preview button text.

data.name: SaveButtonText
data.comment: Save button text for QnA pair.

data.name: DateFormat
data.comment: Used in date string format for adaptive card. {0} is for date and {1} is for time.

data.name: ErrorMessage
data.value: Что-то пошло не так. Повторите попытку позже.
data.comment: Error message to show if there is any exception.

data.name: EmptyDescriptionErrorText
data.comment: Error message to show if description text box is empty while adding or editing the QnA pair.

data.name: SuggestedText
data.value: Для добавления дополнительных сведений в ответ можно использовать дополнительные поля ниже.

data.name: ManuallyAddedQuestionMessage
data.comment: Question answer pair added manually in Question Answering

data.name: UpdateHistoryDateHeaderText
data.comment: Date header text in update history adaptive card text.

data.name: SelectActionItemDisplayTextFormatting
data.comment: The formatting of the select action item display text, with {0} being the placeholder for the DisplayText from the Follow Up prompt.

data.name: AppFeedbackDescriptionPlaceholderText
data.comment: Placeholder for app feedback description

data.name: ShareAppFeedbackRating
data.comment: Feedback for App

data.name: BotCommandAskExpert
data.comment: Bot command Ask an expert. This needs to be match with manifest's command "Ask an expert" in translated json file.

data.name: BotCommandFeedback
data.comment: Bot command Share feedback. This needs to be match with manifest's command "Share feedback" in translated json file.

data.name: BotCommandTour
data.comment: Bot command Take a tour. This needs to be match with manifest's command "Take a tour" in translated json file.
